symptoms.name: Watery diarrhea
symptoms.pattern: Usually the first symptom; can be persistent in some cases

symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.pattern: More common in some types of E. coli infections

vital_signs.temperature: May be elevated in some cases, but usually low-grade or absent
vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated due to dehydration or infection severity

lab_values.blood_tests: May show signs of dehydration or kidney damage (HUS)

risk_factors: Consumption of contaminated food or water
Contact with animals or their environment
Travel to low- and middle-income countries (for some types)

required: Positive stool culture for enteropathogenic E. coli

differential_diagnoses: Other diarrheagenic E. coli infections (ETEC, STEC, EAEC, EIEC)
Other causes of gastroenteritis (viral, parasitic, other bacterial)
